name: The Count of Monte Cristo (itch)
description:
This is a game made by a student for a school project.

It is loosely based on part of the novel The Count of Monte Cristo by Alexandre Dumas. You will platform out of prison, collecting skills throughout your way and end on the isle Monte Cristo. Search the depths of the island to find your treasure, resting assure that you have all you will need to defeat your enemies.

1.1.0 Update:

Adds minor graphical updates.

You now respawn at the last door you entered.

Ways to escape the map have been fixed.

Now able to restart when finished game.
